title: Tomato Pasta
description: Delicious homemade tomato pasta with cheese.
instructions: Boil pasta, cook tomato sauce, mix and serve.

title: Cheese Sandwich
description: Quick grilled cheese sandwich.
instructions: Grill bread with butter and cheese.

title: Veggie Salad
description: Fresh vegetable salad with a light dressing.
instructions: Chop veggies, mix with dressing, and serve.

title: Chinese Fried Rice
description: Chinese Fried Rice with vegetables and a drizzle of soy sauce.
instructions: Stir-fry vegetables, add rice and soy sauce, cook eggs separately and mix in.

title: Chicken Curry
description: Spicy chicken curry with a rich gravy.
instructions: Saut√© onions and garlic, add spices, cook chicken and tomatoes until done.

title: Paneer Butter Masala
description: Creamy paneer curry with tomato-based gravy.
instructions: Cook tomatoes with spices, add paneer and cream, simmer.

title: Veggie Pizza
description: Homemade pizza topped with fresh vegetables and cheese.
instructions: Spread sauce on base, add veggies and cheese, bake until golden.

title: Aloo Paratha
description: Stuffed Indian bread with spiced mashed potatoes.
instructions: Stuff dough with spiced potato mix, roll and cook on pan with butter.

title: Masala Dosa
description: Crispy dosa stuffed with spiced potato filling.
instructions: Spread dosa batter, stuff with potato filling, fold and serve.

title: Idli Sambar
description: Soft idlis served with tangy lentil sambar.
instructions: Steam idlis, cook sambar with lentils, tamarind and vegetables, serve together.

title: Pancakes
description: Fluffy pancakes with syrup.
instructions: Mix batter, cook pancakes on pan, serve with syrup.

title: Omelette
description: Quick egg omelette with veggies.
instructions: Beat eggs with veggies and spices, cook on pan with oil.

title: Biryani
description: Fragrant rice dish with spices and chicken/vegetables.
instructions: Cook rice with spices, layer with chicken/veggies, steam cook.

title: Rajma Chawal
description: Kidney beans curry served with rice.
instructions: Cook rajma with onions, tomatoes and spices, serve with rice.

title: Chole Bhature
description: Spicy chickpeas with fried bread.
instructions: Cook chole with spices, fry bhature and serve together.

title: Dal Tadka
description: Lentils cooked with spices and tempered with ghee.
instructions: Cook lentils, prepare tadka with ghee and spices, pour over dal.

title: Butter Chicken
description: Rich and creamy butter chicken curry.
instructions: Cook chicken with spices, add butter, cream and tomato gravy.

title: Palak Paneer
description: Spinach curry with paneer cubes.
instructions: Cook spinach with spices, add paneer cubes, simmer.

title: Fish Curry
description: Spicy fish curry with coconut milk.
instructions: Cook fish in coconut milk curry with spices.

title: Momos
description: Steamed dumplings with vegetable or chicken filling.
instructions: Prepare filling, stuff in dough, steam until cooked.

title: Spring Rolls
description: Crispy fried rolls with vegetable stuffing.
instructions: Stuff sheets with veggies, roll and deep fry.

title: Pav Bhaji
description: Spicy mashed vegetable curry served with buttered pav.
instructions: Cook veggies with spices, mash, serve with buttered pav.

title: Gulab Jamun
description: Sweet deep-fried dumplings soaked in sugar syrup.
instructions: Prepare dough, fry balls, soak in sugar syrup.

title: Rasgulla
description: Soft and spongy Bengali sweet.
instructions: Prepare chenna from milk, shape into balls, cook in sugar syrup.

title: Kheer
description: Traditional Indian rice pudding dessert.
instructions: Cook rice in milk, add sugar, cardamom and garnish with nuts.
